page.title: 06Southend:The High Street 2
page.content:
{The High Street}is easily accessible for all the peolpe of Southend with two railway lines and many bus services.A survey was made of how people reached the High Street:
% 5 10 15 20 25 30 by taxi :|___ (5%) train:|____________ (17%) car :|____________________ (26%) bus :|________________ (22%) bike :|________ (12%) walk :|_____________ (18%)
People interviewed in the street were of of the general view that the High Street "Didn't cater for the older people" but they "thought the quality of the merchandise was good".
